trans-unit.source: This kickstart profile uses a base channel that is missing packages. In order for all kickstart functionality to work correctly, the following packages should be present in this kickstart's base channel: {0}.
trans-unit.target: 此 kickstart 設定檔使用了一個遺失套件的基礎頻道。若要能使完整的 kickstart 功能運作，下列的套件必須出現在此 kickstart 的基礎頻道：{0}。

trans-unit.source:
To resolve this issue, please check the following things:

  • Is the 'rhn-tools' child software channel for this kickstart profile's base channel available to your organization? If it is not, you will need to request entitlements for the 'rhn-tools' software channel from your @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ administrator.
  • Make sure that the 'rhn-tools' child channel for this kickstart profile's base channel is available to your @@PRODUCT_NAME@@. If it is not, please contact your satellite administrator and request a satellite-sync for the rhn-tools channel and try again.
  • Make sure the rhn-kickstart* packages corresponding to this kickstart are available in the kickstart's base channel's 'rhn-tools' channel. If not, you will need to make them available for this kickstart profile to function properly.
  • Are the packages listed above available in this kickstart's base channel? If not, you will need to make them available for this kickstart profile to function properly.
trans-unit.target:
要解決這問題，請檢查以下項目：

  • 您的組織是否可以使用這 kickstart 設定檔的基礎頻道之「rhn-tools」子軟體 頻道？若否，您需要向您的衛星管理員要求這個「rhn-tools」軟體頻道的權利。
  • 請確定您的衛星伺服器可以使用這個 kickstart 設定檔的基礎頻道之「rhn-tools」 子頻道。若否，請聯絡您的衛星管理員，為這 rhn-tools 頻道要求 satellite-sync （同步衛星伺服器的資料），然後再試一次。
  • 請確定與此 kickstart 相關的 rhn-kickstart* 套件能在 kickstart 的基礎頻道之 「rhn-tools」頻道中找到。若否，請啟用之，如此才能正常運作。
  • 以上所列之套件是否可以在這 kickstart 的基礎頻道中找到？若否，請啟用之，這 樣此 kickstart 設定檔才能正常運作。

trans-unit.source:
NOTE: This system has not checked into the @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ recently. Since a system cannot be updated if it does not check in to @@PRODUCT_NAME@@, it is unlikely that this action will succeed.

Please check the system and ensure rhnsd is running (more info). If it is failing to run, please contact us.
trans-unit.target:
注意：本系統最近未登入 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@。如果系統未登入 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@，它就不能成功進行這動作。

請檢查系統，並確定 rhnsd 正在執行中（更多資訊）。如果它執行失敗，請 連絡我們。

trans-unit.source: A kickstart was not scheduled for {1} because the package profile did not contain the 'up2date' package. An update of that system's package profile may be required.
trans-unit.target: {1} 並未排程 kickstart，因為套件設定檔並不包含「up2date」套件。您需要更新這台系統的套件設定檔。

trans-unit.source: The latest version of up2date has been scheduled for install before the kickstart action, because the currently-installed version does not support automatic reboot.
trans-unit.target: 在 kickstart 之前，已經排程安裝最新版本的 up2date，因為目前安裝的版本並不支援自動重新開機。

trans-unit.source: A new kickstart session was initiated for this system.
trans-unit.target: 為這台系統準備的 kickstart 已經啟動。

trans-unit.source: We require version {0} or greater of up2date in order to kickstart a system. This system has {1} installed but we could not find a version of up2date in this system’s channels to upgrade it to the required version or above.
trans-unit.target: 我們需要 up2date {0} 以上（含）的版本，好對系統進行 kickstart。這台系統已安裝 {1}，但在這台系統上，我們找不到 up2date，無法將其升級至所需的版本。

trans-unit.source:
The guest system has not communicated with @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ in the past {0} minutes. The install process might be progressing slowly due to hardware constraints, or it might be frozen.

You may wish to troubleshoot this issue by running virsh console guestname on the host system. This command will allow you to connect to the text console of the guest as it is installing, which may provide additional information about this guest system's installation status.
trans-unit.target: 過去 {0} 分鐘內，客座端系統並未與衛星伺服器通訊。因為硬體限制，安裝過程可能稍嫌緩慢，或停滯不前。您可以在主系統上執行 virsh console 客座端名稱 進行障礙排除。這指令讓您連接到正在進行安裝的客座端之文字終端機，提供客座端系統安裝狀態的額外資訊。

trans-unit.source: Exceeding the number of physical CPUs ({0}) on {1} may impact performance.
trans-unit.target: 若實體中央處理器在 {1} 上的數量超出（{0}）的話，很有可能會影響效能。

trans-unit.source: {1} must be shutdown if last started with less than {0} vCPUs for changes to take effect.
trans-unit.target: 假如最後一次是以小於 {0} 個 vCPU 來啟動的話，{1} 也許就需要被重新啟動，才能讓改變生效。

trans-unit.source: There is insufficient memory on this host system for the requested guest RAM modification. This host system {0} has reported {1}MB of memory. The requested RAM modifications will require more than the total RAM available on this host (including {2}MB overhead for the hypervisor and memory currently reserved by existing guests.) Please refresh this host system's hardware profile if you believe that it has more than {1}MB.
trans-unit.target: 主系統上記憶體不足，無法變更客座端的記憶體為您想要的大小。這台主機系統 {0} 的記憶體大小為 {1}MB。您所修改的記憶體大小超過本主機所擁有的實際大小（包括 hypervisor 所需的 {2}MB 以及為目前客座端所保留的記憶體。）請更新這台主機系統的硬體設定檔如果這台電腦的記憶體超過 {1}MB。

trans-unit.source: {0} will require a reboot for max memory settings to take effect.

trans-unit.source: Provisioning must be a valid number.
trans-unit.target: Provision 必須是合於規則的數字。
組織 {0} 已經成功地建立

trans-unit.source: Organization {0} was not updated due to identical name.
trans-unit.target: 因為相同的名稱存在，所以組織 {0} 並未更新。
組織 {0} 已成功地被刪除。

trans-unit.source: A file named "{0}" already exists in this channel.
trans-unit.target: 一個稱為「{0}」的檔案已存在此頻道中。

trans-unit.source: Could not automatically subscribe the system to the @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Tools Channel. This channel contains packages required for virtualization. This is most likely caused by a lack of channel entitlements.
trans-unit.target: 無法自動地將系統訂閱至 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Tools 頻道。此頻道包含著虛擬化所需的套件。這通常是因為頻道權利不足。

trans-unit.source: Could not automatically subscribe the system to the RHEL Virtualization Channel. This channel contains packages required for virtualization. This is most likely caused by a lack of channel entitlements.
trans-unit.target: 無法自動地將系統訂閱至 RHEL Virtualization 頻道。此頻道包含著虛擬化所需的套件。這通常是因為頻道權利不足。

trans-unit.source: Could not find the {0} package in the {1} channel which is required to perform virtualization with the @@PRODUCT_NAME@@.
trans-unit.target: 在 {1} 頻道中無法找到 {0} 這個套件，此套件是 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 實施虛擬化時所需的套件。

trans-unit.source: The system already has the {0} entitlement.
trans-unit.target: 系統已經擁有 {0} 這項權利了。

trans-unit.source: Since you added a Virtualization entitlement to the system we also performed some extra steps to ensure your system will be able to manage virtual guests better. See here for more info.
trans-unit.target: 當您增加了虛擬化權利至您的系統的同時，我們也實施了一些額外的步驟來確保您的系統能夠更有效地管理虛擬客座。欲取得更多資訊請參閱 這裡。

trans-unit.source: A system can have either the Virtualization or Virtualization Platform entitlement but not both.
trans-unit.target: 一台系統能夠擁有 Virtualization（虛擬化）「或是」Virtualization Platform（虛擬化平台）權利，但不能同時擁有兩者。

trans-unit.source: Invalid add-on entitlement [{0}] provided.No such entitlement exists.
trans-unit.target: 提供了錯誤的額外權利「{0}」。這項權利不存在。

trans-unit.source: There were no more {0} System Entitlements available.
trans-unit.target: 已經沒有剩餘的 {0} 系統權利。

trans-unit.source: There are no more channel entitlements available.
trans-unit.target: 已經沒有剩餘的頻道權利可用。

trans-unit.source: {0} entitlements cannot be added to solaris machines
trans-unit.target: {0} 權利無法新增到 Solaris 機器上
勘誤已經存在於建議 {0} 中

trans-unit.source: Unable to locate or access server group: "{0}"
trans-unit.target: 無法找到或存取伺服器群組：「{0}」

trans-unit.source: The specified server is not a member of the specified group
trans-unit.target: 指定的伺服器不是特定群組的成員

trans-unit.source: Invalid errata type, "{0}". Please use one of the following: "Security Advisory", "Product Enhancement Advisory", or "Bug Fix Advisory".
trans-unit.target: 無效的勘誤類型「{0}」。請使用以下選項：「Security Advisory」、「Product Enhancement Advisory」、「Bug Fix Advisory」。

trans-unit.source: You are trying to publish an errata but have not selected any channels to publish to. Errata must be published to at least one channel.
trans-unit.target: 您試圖出版一項勘誤，但並未選擇任何出版頻道。勘誤必須出版到至少一個頻道上。

trans-unit.source: Unable to subscribe this system to the requested channel: "{0}"
trans-unit.target: 無法訂閱此系統至所要求的頻道：「{0}」

trans-unit.source: Multiple base channels selected for subscription. The channels {0} and {1} were both selected for subscription, but a system can only be subscribed to a single base channel.
trans-unit.target: 已選擇多個頻道供訂閱用。頻道 {0} 與 {1} 都已經選為訂閱，但系統一次只能訂閱一個基礎頻道。

trans-unit.source: The channel arch specified ({0}) is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 指定的頻道架構（{0}）並不合乎規定。

trans-unit.source: The channel label specified ({0}) already exists.
trans-unit.target: 指定的頻道標籤（{0}）已經存在。
不合乎規定的虛擬類型：{0}

trans-unit.source: Unable to locate kickstart tree for your organization: {0}
trans-unit.target: 找不到您組織的 kickstart 樹：{0}
不合乎規定的 kickstart 標籤：{0}

trans-unit.source: The package arch specified ({0}) is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 指定的套件架構（{0}）不合乎規定。

trans-unit.source: A required errata attribute ({0}) was missing.
trans-unit.target: 所需的勘誤屬性（{0}）已經佚失。

trans-unit.source: You attempted to give {0} too many entitlements. Please enter a value lower than or equal to {1}
trans-unit.target: 您試圖給 {0} 太多權利。請輸入低於或相同於 {1} 的值

trans-unit.source: You attempted to give {0} too many entitlements. Please enter a value lower than or equal to {1}
trans-unit.target: 您試圖給 {0} 太多權利。請輸入低於或相同於 {1} 的值

trans-unit.source: Warning: Your Proposed entitlement allocation for {0} requires more entitlements than are in use for the {1} Organization. Please adjust your proposed allocation accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 警告：您想給 {0} 所分配的權利多過 {1} 組織所擁有的權利。請適量調整您想分配的權利。

trans-unit.source: You are not allowed to update entitlements in the Default Org. These entitlements are determined by your satellite certificate file.
trans-unit.target: 您不允許在預設組織中更新權利。這些權利是由您的衛星伺服器認證檔所決定的。

trans-unit.source: The list of {0} item(s) below is filtered.
trans-unit.target: {0} 個項目的清單已經過濾掉了。

trans-unit.source: The list below is not filtered, because the term you entered to filter by, '{0}', returned matches for every item in the list. Try to filter by a more unique term.
trans-unit.target: 以下清單並未過濾，因為您所輸入的過濾條件「{0}」傳回了清單中的每一個項目。請試著用更獨特的字眼來過濾。

trans-unit.source: The empty list below is filtered.
trans-unit.target: 以下空白清單已經過濾過了。

trans-unit.source: Length of guest names must be at least {0} characters.
trans-unit.target: 客座名稱的長度不能低於 {0} 個字元。

trans-unit.source: Memory Allocation must be a positive value greater than 0.
trans-unit.target: 記憶體分配必須是超過零的數。

trans-unit.source: Virtual CPUs must be set to a positive value greater than 0 and less than {0}.
trans-unit.target: 虛擬處理器必須設定為超過零的值，並小於 {0}。

trans-unit.source: Storage must be set to a value greater than 0.
trans-unit.target: 儲存數目必須設定為大於零的值。

trans-unit.source: Succesfully added {0} Errata and {1} package(s) to channel {2}.
trans-unit.target: 成功地將 {0} 個勘誤與 {1} 套件加入頻道 {2}。

trans-unit.source: You do not have sufficient permissions to perform this action.
trans-unit.target: 您沒有足夠的權限進行這項工作。

trans-unit.target: {0} 更新叢集已經從這頻道中移除

trans-unit.target: 您沒有足夠的權限，將套件合併至 {0} 頻道
